#summary List of libraries here and quick links to relevant source and examples files.
#labels Featured

Below is a list of the libraries being worked on in this project. Each project should have the following folders: docs (for documentation), src (for javascript source), examples. 


== MarkerManager ==

This is the open-source version of GMarkerManager, with improvements.

[http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/markermanager/release/ Link to Release (1.0) Version]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/markermanager/release/docs/examples.html Examples]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/markermanager/release/docs/reference.html Reference]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/markermanager/release/src/markermanager.js Javascript include]

[http://gmaps-utility-library-dev.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/markermanager/ Link to Development Version]


== LabeledMarker ==

This class extends the Maps API's standard GMarker class with the ability to support markers with textual labels. 

[http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/labeledmarker/release/ Link to Release (1.0) Version]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/labeledmarker/release/docs/examples.html Examples]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/labeledmarker/release/docs/reference.html Reference]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/labeledmarker/release/src/labeledmarker.js Javascript include]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/labeledmarker/release/src/labeledmarker_packed.js Javascript include (packed)]

[http://gmaps-utility-library-dev.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/labeledmarker/ Link to Development Version]


== DragZoom ==

This is a control created by Andre Lewis that allows you to select an area on the map by dragging a rectangle and the map will then zoom to that area.

[http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dragzoom/release/ Link to Release (1.0) Version]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dragzoom/release/docs/examples.html Examples]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dragzoom/release/docs/reference.html Reference]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dragzoom/release/src/dragzoom.js Javascript include]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dragzoom/release/src/dragzoom_packed.js Javascript include (packed)]

[http://gmaps-utility-library-dev.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dragzoom/ Link to Development Version]

== ExtMapTypeControl ==

This is a control that mimics MapTypeControl and optionally has a Traffic button with drop down legend.

[http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/extmaptypecontrol/release/ Link to Release (1.0) Version]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/extmaptypecontrol/release/docs/examples.html Examples]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/extmaptypecontrol/release/docs/reference.html Reference]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/extmaptypecontrol/release/src/dragzoom.js Javascript include]
  * [http://gmaps-utility-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/extmaptypecontrol/release/src/dragzoom_packed.js Javascript include (packed)]

[http://gmaps-utility-library-dev.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/extmaptypecontrol/ Link to Development Version]
